TopicTitle: Cannot 'Edit' my own profile on this forum?

Articles.Content: Just registered forum account day or two ago, so perhaps this is due to being new account...but when I go to 'settings' and then click the option/tab on the r-side of screen which says "Edit Profile" I get a pop-up window saying "You are not allowed to Edit this Profile"...why can I not edit my own profile?
Because you still might be a sneaky spambot.  After you post a few more times and they are not ads, you will automatically gain the ability to customize your profile.

Thank you.  Such information might be good to post in an FYI type place...or if it is, may I have a link to read it so as to not have to ask dumb-questions again in the future?  Thank you for your time and assistance.

On 3/25/2019 at 4:03 AM, Vanamonde said:

Because you still might be a sneaky spambot.  After you post a few more times and they are not ads, you will automatically gain the ability to customize your profile. 

Thanks
